  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</a></div><div style="clear:both;"></div></div><div><sup>Sponsored</sup></div></div><div class="cell show-for-medium medium-6" style="padding: 0.6rem;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="29083" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="29083" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.04</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2891">2,891</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="316"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>A La Rose</b> by <b>Maison Francis Kurkdjian</b> is a Floral fragrance for women. <b>A La Rose</b> was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top notes are Calabrian bergamot and California Orange; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Grasse Rose, Violet and Magnolia; base notes are Musk and Cedar. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Maison Francis Kurkdjian presents the new women’s fragrance which arrives exclusively on the Japanese market. The perfume arrives after women’s fragrance  Feminin Pluriel  which also includes roses framed in flowers of iris, violet, jasmine and lily of the valley. Composition of the new fragrance is inspired by Marie Antoinette’s love of roses and a portrait of Marie Antoinette A La Rose painted by Louise Elisabeth Vigée-Lebrun, in which she is holding a rose in her hand. </p>

<p>
Maison Francis Kurkdjian A La Rose is composed of two sorts of roses, Damascus rose and Turkish rose absolute, carefully refreshed with a citrusy blend of bergamot, orange and lemon in top notes. Powdery floral notes are combined with a bouquet of roses and velvety violets, while base notes provide character to woody notes of cedar. </p>

<p>
Fragrance A La Rose is available as 70 ml Eau de Parfum exclusively in Japan.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages:                     </div>

</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bulgarian Rose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Grasse Rose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.85480333137226; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.116.jpg" style="width: 3.05rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Violet-116.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Violet</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.7475514178297; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.147.jpg" style="width: 2.55rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Magnolia-147.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Magnolia</div></div></div>

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371634" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VirgowithLeo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408961.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="VirgowithLeo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408961">VirgowithLeo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733409503" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do like the powdery rose scent<br />
However when I sniff close to my skin it has this green ish note which I think is the bergamot<br />
<br />
It is too light. So I cannot even tell how the scent is for sure if I am picking up the notes right etc because I can hardly smell it<br />
<br />
This is not worth the price tag<br />
Because with Jo malone peony and blush I get the same powdery scent on my skin<br />
But ofc in here I do love that it is rose instead of peony<br />
<br />
If this was a bit louder, this would have been the perfect rose scent (assuming the bergamot would not be present all throughout)<br />
<br />
But it is so so faint. I can barely smell it on me even after multiple sprays<br />
<br />
I am gonna test it out again <br />
Because when I do finally get a whiff I like it. It is sweet powdery rose<br />
I am gonna try to see how long the bergamot stays</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2371634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2371634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366113" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="QueenVictoria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902255"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1902255.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="QueenVictoria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44894.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Bloom"title="Gucci Bloom"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902255">QueenVictoria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 10:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Extremely light straightforward rose. Has something in the dry down that reminds me of the smell of the box of holiday decorations, something stale. I think it can finally say that my favorite straightforward rose is Dior Rose Kabuki.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2366113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2366113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2342471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2342471" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KerriZ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1506615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KerriZ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2342471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2342471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615">KerriZ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 14:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very pretty rose. one hundred percent reminded me of Acqua di Parma Rose Nobile, which has a soft place in my heart because it was a gift from my mom. RIP. She loved buying beautiful fragrances at Nordstroms. And while it softens through out the wear it stays in its rosy lane without wavering for several hours. <br />
<br />
I imagine a spring day. A beautiful dress. A straw hat. Strolling in a gorgeous rose garden breathing in the fragrant smell of exquisite flowers. It is a very happy scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2342471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2342471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332745" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ElifMelekYıldız"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292220"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2292220.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ElifMelekYıldız" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332745ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332745" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292220">ElifMelekYıldız</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 13:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It will always be in my top 5 favorite perfumes for the rest of my life. With all due respect, some people have stated that this scent is only a realistic rose scent; even a rose water scent. Sis, lets try: place a landscape with high freshness of nature in a perfume bottle that is accessible at all times, than i will respect to your ideas ok? Also I must say that, this fragrance is amazingly beautiful on my skin; on the days when I use it, someone always/ mustly asks to me, which perfume I did wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2332745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2332745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331986" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331986" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elindor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374664"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elindor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331986ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331986" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374664">Elindor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I initially tried this back in 2022 or 2023.<br />
<br />
I didn't like it then, it reminded me of old lady Rose smell. Very powdery and kind of soapy.<br />
<br />
I've since caught covid and its damaged my nose and changed how I can smell things. I retried this last night and it now reminds me heavily of a slightly rosy Green Tea by Elizabeth Arden (which I understand was designed by FK so I'm not surprised). No powder or soap.<br />
<br />
At first I couldn't smell it on my skin, I did one spray on one wrist, but it just took some warming up. By about hour 3 it felt strong and I started getting a melony scent - that's probably due to covid. This morning it was all over the cardigan I was wearing so it's stronger than I first assumed.<br />
<br />
I like this now, but I don't know that I'd spend this much on it when I already have Green Tea in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2331986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2331986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303717" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jkiins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2268689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2268689.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jkiins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303717ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303717" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); This is a photorealistic rose scent just like the name suggests. I see a lot of people complaining about longevity but on my skin I do get a good 3-6 hours of staying power. The violet note gives it a slight powdery feel. This is a must have though for anyone who loves rose scents. Perfect for a spring day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2303717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2303717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289862" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pollilyo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082294"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2082294.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pollilyo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); The fragrance stays on me for 1-2 hours</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2289862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2289862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270271" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MeriseGuashe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2228006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2228006.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MeriseGuashe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elie-Saab/Le-Parfum-12258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Parfum"title="Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270271ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270271" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2228006">MeriseGuashe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 11:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a big garden where I grow Turkish roses. I harvest those roses in the early morning hours of spring and early summer. I sell the good ones before evening and keep some for myself to make jam. I separate the petals from the cheeks of the roses while making the jam, at this point a beautiful scent fills my hands and that very scent is exactly A La Rose herself. An extremely realistic and enchanting interpretation of roses. If it were a little more long-lasting, I would use it all year round, but one of the things that makes this scent beautiful is its shy innocence ofcourse. It is beautiful but delicate, just like pink Turkish roses which should be enjoyed for a lifetime.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2270271"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2270271#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257489" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Whiff_Of_Brilliance101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2126503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Whiff_Of_Brilliance101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257489ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257489" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2126503">Whiff_Of_Brilliance101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 11:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It’s a very realistic rose scent, reminds me of gardening roses and that heavenly smell when it finally blooms to its full potential! It is perfect for spring and summer, I would even wear this in the autumn. It lasted a long time on my skin, around 4+ hours. I would consider buying the 35ml bottle however I had to put on at least 4 sprays just so I could see the longevity of it which means that I’d definitely run out of a 35ml bottle quite fast if I used this everyday. I wish the price was significantly lower because then I’d buy it in an instant!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2257489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2257489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245674" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So, although it's great fragrance for a short while, I won't be buying an FB.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2245674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2245674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237243" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237243" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Phoenix Cat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1860536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Phoenix Cat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29083.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A La Rose"title="A La Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237243ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237243" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860536">Phoenix Cat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 20:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautiful green soapy rose. This is the kind of perfume you wear to a casual tea party or brunch. It's fresh, citrusy and sweet. Such a classy daily wear scent.<br />
<br />
It reminds me of a J&amp;J tv commercial of a sweet teen girl dancing on the fresh grass in a bright spring garden in a flowy yellow dress. Blue skies and a steady cool breeze. <br />
<br />
At first whiff it is almost the same as the body shop's British Rose scent and after a few minutes it transforms into a very soapy rose. I love that it's not powdery at all. Smells like you just took a bath and splashed on rose water. I'm into it. Love it so much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2237243"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2237243#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very unisex and versatile. It almost resembles rose lemonade in that the bergamot and citrus is so prominent. Very bright, energetic  and summery. I must say I was slightly underwhelmed. If you’re looking for simplicity and a high quality rose then this may be for you. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1837350">sammsullivann</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It’s very nice, but just a simple photorealistic rose perfume. Nothing really special about it to me and for the price it’s not worth buying again</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2214076"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2214076#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2209782" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2209782" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aquapinkmoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1809463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aquapinkmoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-632.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.632.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bright Crystal"title="Bright Crystal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2209782ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2209782" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463">Aquapinkmoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-06">07/06/24 04:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent itself is a very pretty and realistic soft rose scent, but unfortunately, I had to vote as ‘dislike’ because the longevity and siliage is awfully poor. At this price point, there is absolutely no excuse for such disappointing performance, I’m talking, completely dissapears after an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2209782"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2209782#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2208098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2208098" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pikach26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173359"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pikach26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2208098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2208098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173359">Pikach26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-04">07/04/24 10:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very realistic rose scent.  It is perfectly done, delicate a master piece.  I was given a decant from MFK and I felt in love with it. In my skin, it lasts 5-6 hours. It will be in my collection of florals with Gucci Bloom and Anais, Anais.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2208098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2208098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199138" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="icerise"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1001214.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="icerise" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199138ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199138" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214">icerise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 09:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To be honest, I was really looking forward to this because I was thinking it would have that Thayers Rose Petal witch hazel toner smell (which I adore).  While I did get a bit of that, I also got a headache.  They added their own spin to it via citrus notes, which I’m all for (I’m a citrus fragrance kinda gal), but it was too much, and there’s something really grassy-smelling that’s throwing me off, as if  they omitted the petals during composition and just focused on the rose stem.  While it gives it—what could have been a typical rose scent—dimension, it makes me wince whenever I’m hit with the grass and citrus notes combo.  It’s too strident for me, and the fragrance overall is a more aggressive sister of Bath and Body Works’ Rose Water and Ivy.  My stomach just started churning.  That’s how acidic it is for me, but if you’re a fan of rose scents, you should still give it a try.  It does smell sophisticated and refined, a little mature, but also generic?  I once got gifted a $5-10 rose hand cream that smelled exactly like this, so I wouldn’t say it knocked it out of the park in terms of originality.  Not sure if it’s the safest blind buy, either.  What a pretty bottle to add to one’s collection, but for me I would probably regret it if I had purchased the full-sized version.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2199138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2199138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196389" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196389" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jow012"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jow012" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196389ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196389" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722924">jow012</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 14:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am here to update my review below,<br />
I absolutely fell in love with this perfume and loved the dry down on all the testers I've ever tried in the department stores. I was able to find this on discount at TJ Maxx, it was a brand new box sealed. I can tell you guys that this does NOT age well. The batch code says it's from 2022 and the only thing I can smell is ambroxan. It is a huge ambroxan bomb. I feel like companies should disclose whether or not any fragrance has ambroxan in it because it's so polarizing.<br />
<br />
To me, ambroxan smells horrible. It smells like plastic and the inside of a nylon sports bag or the rubber on new shoes. The top notes on this must fly away very fast in the bottle so if you're going to purchase this you need to get a fresh bottle and use it fast or try out the EDT version Eau Rose (I did not like that one because it's an EDT and it's easily replicated and not worth the price).<br />
<br />
I'm going to have to take back all of the raves of this perfume because for the price point of $275 people should be able to use it for minimum 5 years with no worries of it turning. If they can release a version of the same exact top notes with none of the base notes I would buy it. But as the perfume stands right now it is 100% not worth any of your money. I say this with a heavy heart as this was on my wishlist for over 2 years! The search continues.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2196389"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2196389#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190849" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="x.rina.x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1481456"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1481456.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="x.rina.x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hundred-Silent-Ways-37602.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37602.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hundred Silent Ways"title="Hundred Silent Ways"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1481456">x.rina.x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an ethereal, dewy fresh and rich creation.  In my opinion it's a fairy like, princess-ly elegant, photorealistic, luxurious and truly natural smelling dreamy rose fragrance. The rose absolutum what is used in this composition is very high quality. And this fragrance is not that usual citrusy rose, i can feel here not just the citrusy aspect of the flower, but that very light, mild and mellow buttery-creamy facet of the rose as well. This mild and light creaminess is highligted from the vackground by the light waxy facet of magnolia. And by time the rose get some soft powdery aspect by the fragile and innocent smelling violet &amp; musk. Usually I'm not Rose lover, but this one is truly divine...For me this is the perfect dainty &amp; tender rose fragrance so far.♡</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2190849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2190849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184744" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="whitenine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1634005"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1634005.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="whitenine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Gris-Dior-48387.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48387.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Dior"title="Gris Dior"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1634005">whitenine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 05:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a beautiful dewy rose with a hint of soap, perfect as a daytime fragrance especially during sunny days.<br />
<br />
What I like most about this perfume is that, the rose note doesn't smell old or grown. It's just realistic and beautiful.<br />
<br />
But it breaks my heart that this doesn't last on my skin and clothes. It's very faint that even Lost Cherry last longer than her.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2184744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2184744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182629" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182629" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jow012"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jow012" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182629ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182629" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722924">jow012</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 23:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cannot find anything that has the same beautiful dry down and elegant quality that A La Rose has. It's incredibly beautiful. I'm a soft, feminine fragrance girl and I just have to say, this is amazing and lasts quite long for what type of fragrance it is. The only thing about this one is how screechy the opening is. I thought it was different and you just had to wait longer for the alcohol to evaporate, but I definitely think there's some type of citrus that just opens up super sharp. Then what follows is a beautiful soft, watery rose. It's not soapy, but sweet and delicate which I love! I really dislike sharp notes so thankfully the sharpness is only in the opening. It IS kind of harsh on the nose to handle so even if you love rose and soft fragrances, this one is not a safe blind buy. Please please go smell it first, especially for this price point.<br />
I'm just waiting for a decent promo to grab it and put it into my girly perfume  collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2182629"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2182629#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171628" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2171628" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rozalina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243220"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1243220.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rozalina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2171628ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2171628" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243220">Rozalina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 13:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A La Rose is a delightfully tender lemony rose during the first hour. I sprayed Paul Smith Roses on my other arm to compare, and I definitely noticed that there is an understated elegance in the MFK creation compared to the other perfume. However, the longevity is abysmal, and for the majority of its lifespan it is a too-soft skin musk with a splash of rosewater. If a fragrance is special enough, I will buy it at a higher price point, even if it's weak. However, as pretty as this is, it is not unique enough to justify the expensive price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2171628"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2171628#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2159112" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2159112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2159112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079916">Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-17">05/17/24 10:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My brother owns Aqua universalis and I can say A la rose smells the same with rose in it. Maybe it's the citrus. It overpowers the rose scent. I would have loved if the rose was the dominant one. Nonetheless it's a beautiful perfume and I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2159112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2159112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2150600" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2150600" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumepearl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792886"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumepearl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Not-A-Perfume-10296.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10296.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Not A Perfume"title="Not A Perfume"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2150600ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2150600" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792886">perfumepearl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-09">05/09/24 09:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful dewy rose scent, an absolute master piece. Perfect for spring and summer, FK is just an amazing perfumeur. This reminds me of my The Body Shop Rose shower gel, and I like it a lot. I'm just not sure if I want it in a perfume version.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="2150600"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=2150600#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
