<br />
I went back into selfridges to smell it one last time<br />
It was really really nice but smells genetic<br />
<br />
It does leave a nice powdery skin scent that lasts until the next day<br />
<br />
The opening deffo smells like wet roses in a garden<br />
It is really nice and realistic but I think I'll get this when I'm older<br />
<br />
It is a bit sweet and my too sweet which is what I like<br />
<br />
If I had good perfume, I would use it to layer over oud or something to make it more interesting <br />
<br />
It is still nice and pretty and romantic<br />
Not sexy but just nice<br />
<br />
The opening reminded me of British rose lotion by body shop</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1546954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1546954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1533712" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1533712" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="msamber86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="msamber86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1533712ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1533712" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480461">msamber86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-30">03/30/22 16:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This definitely smells like a bouquet of roses including the green and earthy notes. It is intoxicating, but honestly doesn’t feel a perfume. I would love to spray this in a bouquet of fake flowers so I could imitate having fresh flowers in the house. Or maybe it would be a great candle. This rose is just too realistic to me but I give it props for getting it picture perfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1533712"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1533712#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1532282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1532282" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gedlive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.866522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gedlive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Equipage-7.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Equipage"title="Equipage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1532282ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1532282" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522">gedlive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-28">03/28/22 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A La Rose iš gender neutral, or I will use the term I don't like, "unisex".<br />
I had Delta COVID 4 months ago and my smell has not come back completely yet, yikes.<br />
But I can say, this has a lot of rose, and a great quality rose. The violet and magnolia are more masculine florals, together with a green, fresh spiciness, makes it wearable for me, a guy.<br />
Kurkdijian mixes soft feminine florals, with cummin, or darker and dirtier notes.  There is some of that going on here.<br />
This is similar to Lumiere Noire Pour Femme, maybe slightly more masculine. Lumiere Noire Pour Homme was his greatest masterpiece and will be in my top 5 fragrances for all time, sadly discontinued.<br />
A la Rose is more feminine than Lumiere Noire PH.<br />
<br />
The Lord Jesus is coming. Have you received Him?<br />
<br />
God bless you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1532282"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1532282#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1526586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It makes me think of Chanel Chance eau Tendre (parfum) without the quince that I'm not really a fan of.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1517101"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1517101#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1511507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1511507" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shaven"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1167536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shaven" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Artisan-Parfumeur/The-Pour-Un-Ete-4436.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4436.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Pour Un Ete"title="The Pour Un Ete"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1511507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1511507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167536">Shaven</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-24">02/24/22 21:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this is the excellent choice for simple and chic modern rose perfume. There are other scents of similar style off my head: Rose Royale by Parfums de Nicolai, Eau Rose by Diptyque, Rosa Nobile by Acqua di Parma, and Rose de Mai by Fragonard. A la Rose smells like softened Rosa Mobile to my nose. It is among the "reminds me of" section as well. MFK lines are expensive but they had a great sample program which allowed me to choose 4 scents for 14 Euro. The boutique in Paris shipped them for free to USA, where I live(I was charged with $17 for all). Recently released smaller bottle may work for me thanks to the A la Rose's superb longevity and projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1511507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1511507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1506352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I plan on using up my sample but it is far too expensive for a full sized bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1500925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1500925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1498497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It does give  the impression of having green notes but it's the citrus that blends well. It is a spring/summer scent, it doesn't project long enough, I say about 3 hours the most. The sillage is moderate and safe for office use. I find it similar to Blouse from YSL !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1498497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1498497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1496580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very similar to Diptyque Eau Rose. I much prefer Dyptique tho. The price point is better. Silage is a bit more pronounced and it’s just better overall IMO (as far as hyper realistic). This is still nice tho. Would be something I would love to spray on a nice spring morning or afternoon dressed in light colours and loose fabric. Very uplifting but just not the projection I wished for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1496580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1496580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1476064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It’s too expensive for a skin scent that lasts 1 hour</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1473040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1473040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1472807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1472807" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ladyluckless"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387256.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ladyluckless" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1472807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1472807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387256">ladyluckless</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-29">12/29/21 19:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is this pretty much a basic rose skin scent? Yes. Am I still completely obsessed? Also yes. Will I be purchasing a full-size? Absolutely not. <br />
<br />
It is definitely the most realistic rose I've smelt in a perfume so far. The opening is pure greenery: fresh-cut stems in water, grass after rain. The rose settles in immediately afterwards, and there's no other way to describe it but rose, a pure, fresh, just bloomed pink rose. It's beautiful, but because of the poor longevity &amp; sillage, I can't justify spending a dime on a full-size.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1472807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1472807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1459004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1459004" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lucyintheskywithdiamonds"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414232"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414232.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lucyintheskywithdiamonds" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Infusion-de-Rose-11233.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11233.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Infusion de Rose"title="Infusion de Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1459004ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1459004" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414232">Lucyintheskywithdiamonds</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-07">12/07/21 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A La Rose is a delightful scent. Airy, light, baby pink rose. Office friendly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1459004"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1459004#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1455821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I adore MFK, I own many of his frags but I just can’t get behind this one. I so wanted to love it. I love anything rose. This one is just badly made. This is a perfume for those who want to wear a nice perfume but don’t want anything strong, they want a barely there perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1439656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1439656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1434905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1434905" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnotherScentLover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnotherScentLover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Si-Fiori-53243.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53243.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sì Fiori"title="Sì Fiori"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1434905ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1434905" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); So beautiful especially the dry down 😍😍😍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1434905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1434905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1434520" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1434520" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChiKitty2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.43823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChiKitty2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragonard/Rose-Lavande-46599.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46599.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Lavande"title="Rose Lavande"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1434520ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1434520" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43823">ChiKitty2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-25">10/25/21 17:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fresh pink rose with all the fresh green leaves at first whiff.  Fresh like sticking my nose into the very center of the rose where the yellow stamens are with petals all around.  Definitely pink and not red, an innocent youthful rose.  A transient citrus note like bergamot.  Powdery drydown, smells like scented body powder. Lingers close to the skin and smells very delicate and gentle.<br />
<br />
It reminds me of a tiny coveted sample I had of Shiseido White Rose, a natural rose perfume that was only available for sale in Japan.  If you always wanted to try that but didn't, definitely give MFK A La Rose a try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1434520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1434520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1434245" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1434245" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="redberry11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1371786.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="redberry11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Apres-L-Ondee-Eau-de-Toilette-65155.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65155.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Après L'Ondée Eau de Toilette"title="Après L'Ondée Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1434245ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1434245" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371786">redberry11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-25">10/25/21 06:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a gentle citrusy rose, the one that doesn't smell intense - the one you only get whiffs of tender sweetness here and there. The soapy drydown is very inoffensive too. This could be a safe gift for somebody who doesn't like loud scents and isn't too interested in perfumes but likes well made and expensive things. For me it's just too translucent and short-lived, a scented mist basically.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1434245"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1434245#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1433821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1433821" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smellysmello"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112814"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112814.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smellysmello" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1433821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1433821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112814">smellysmello</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-24">10/24/21 10:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Favorite fresh red rose perfume. Natural smelling, lovely young roses with a gentle sprinkle of citrus in the opening. Nothing twee or old-fashioned. Fresh, light, pretty, but still a bit elegant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1433821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1433821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1426889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1426889" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bow Nuttaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/527954"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.527954.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bow Nuttaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Amyris-Femme-15565.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15565.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amyris Femme"title="Amyris Femme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1426889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1426889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/527954">Bow Nuttaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-12">10/12/21 11:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very prominent and realistic rose scent. Gentle and polite. <br />
If you like rose and inoffensive scent, this is for you. <br />
In the same luxury floral category, I much prefer the Feminin Pluriel, also from the MFK.<br />
The FP sparks much more joy. I also love some jasmine in my perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1426889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1426889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1419284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very pretty and feminine. It is also slightly powdery. On my skin, I get mostly the rose and citrus immediately then it settles into a clean musky smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1419284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1419284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1399302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Being MFK, I was a little skeptical - maybe too synthetic, sweet, or powdery drink concentrate minus the water.  Nope!  Me likey! Concur with majority of positive reviews.  Not earth-shattering.  Just a good citrus rose scent.  <br />
<br />
It’s light.  Dry down is good, doesn’t turn some weird corner.  <br />
<br />
Ooh, and I’d had a frankincense and myrrh oil on my hand that had worn down….. I put a little of this on top and it smelled good that way, too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1392853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1392853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1390906" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is a rip off. <br />

Rose and violet, hint of citruses that’s it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1389758"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1389758#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1388168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/102338">yujinclara</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-07">08/07/21 03:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh I love this rose. This is the most perfect rose perfume I have ever smelled. <br />
It is perfectly gorgeous with a hint of musk and magnolia.<br />
<br />
I also like to layer this on top of the baccarat rouge 540. The added rose gives a real feminine edge and I can’t stop sniffing myself. 😍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1388168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1388168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1383024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1383024" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iremis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1267372"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1267372.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iremis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Kenzo-Amour-664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kenzo Amour"title="Kenzo Amour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1383024ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1383024" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1267372">iremis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-28">07/28/21 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, this isnt as fresh as i thought it would be. If you expect Chloe type of rose perfume, be aware. Because this isnt a rose perfume, this is a literal rose. Therefore, its not fresh and airy. It just smells like a beautiful, fully bloomed rose. <br />
 I still very much like it, and its high quality and smells expensive like other MFK fragrances, but not as complex as others. <br />
 The thing is, where i am from rose water is super common, so our perspective of rose scents is different from westerners. A rose fragrance this literal is considered old by our standards since its the elderly who constantly use rose water. However this is NOT an old lady perfume from a western perspective. You’ll smell like an actual pink rose which is great to me. <br />
 So i wont be using this but i appreciate it all the same. I’ll be looking into perfumes like Chloe signature where the rose note is the star but not pretty much all you smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1383024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1383024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1378009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Easy, a single fresh cut rose on the table. I just got a decant of this and I immediately regretted it. It smells exactly like my old bottle of Rose by solinotes and Chloe combined. I wish I wasn’t lazy enough to go to the store and smell this in person, so I could save myself from regret.<br />
<br />
<br />
I imagine it would be a slap in the face if I walked around and be asked if I was wearing a Chloe flanker. Kinda like wearing the BR 540 and asked if you’re wearing AG’s Cloud. Ugh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1375634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1375634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1371914" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1361645" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Libran Goddess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276898"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1276898.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Libran Goddess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-Est-Belle-Intensement-59326.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59326.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Vie Est Belle Intensément"title="La Vie Est Belle Intensément"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1361645ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1361645" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276898">Libran Goddess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-17">06/17/21 14:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very light lemony rose. This fragrance has no depth. Its pleasant but not worth the money. Aerins Rose de grasse is a better light rose scent as far as sillage and longevity go.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1361645"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1361645#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354257" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354257" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Forbiddenjade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/359188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.359188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Forbiddenjade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Prive-Vert-Malachite-34588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Prive Vert Malachite"title="Armani Prive Vert Malachite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354257ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354257" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/359188">Forbiddenjade</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-04">06/04/21 03:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ah, La Rose! :)<br />
<br />
Fresh, lemony uplifting petalia with prominent rose. Upon first spritz it immediately reminded me of a fragrance I re-bought last summer, that being Stella Eau De Toilette (2015, dotty bottle). The two are alike mother and daughter, with pleasant tiny differences to distinguish them. <br />
<br />
ALR is more on the citrus-y lift of the rose, Stella rather citrus backing and so less sparkly if you wish. Worth full bottle at bargain price if you like gentle roses for morning and scorching temperatures - it will refresh you and make you feel like a ... well, rose! <br />
<br />
On my top shelf as of yesterday, I'll never part from her. Bravo Monsieur Kurkdjian.<br />
<br />
PS: it follows you as a trail wherever you go... I see this as the perfect wedding fragrance. Absolutely angelic! Sprayed on clothes it will delight you even longer ;)<br />
PPS: for anyone knowing more about real roses, this smells like the variety Silas Marner (English rose bush). I have one and adore it - can't believe FK managed such photorealistic replica.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1354257"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1354257#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1352453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1352453" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emilyjxne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336026"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1336026.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emilyjxne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1352453ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1352453" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336026">emilyjxne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-01">06/01/21 02:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought a MFK sample set &amp; was excited to wear this one as it’s the weather for a light floral in the UK currently.<br />
<br />
It’s a light, fresh, pretty floral - totally pleasant. Whilst it’s well blended, it reminds me of any old designer floral like Chloé. This and the sillage/projection being really intimate means that all in all it’s really not worth the £ for me. I’ll wear and enjoy the rest of the sample but it’s not a bottle buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1352453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1352453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1348668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1348668" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="holocene"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241652"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1241652.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="holocene" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1348668ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1348668" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241652">holocene</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-24">05/24/21 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very light and boring fragrance to me. Don’t get me wrong, it is pleasant but it’s just not remarkable or unique in any way. It is a soft sweet pretty rose with citrus, and that’s really it, there are plenty of other scents like this, and way better rose scents out there. One of my least favourites from MFK. <br />
<br />
Not much sillage, projection or longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1348668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1348668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1347256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very fresh and floral. <br />
Shame there is not enough presence from cedar to give some depth. It smells  similar to coco Mademoiselle and a died down very weak  floral version of   Coco noir <br />

Dreamy, mesmerizing, comforting, delicate, ethereal. So incredibly pleasant to wear. It is so clean, pure and invigorating. Totally stunning. A literal pleasure to smell. Love from the the very beginning to the very end. Stunningly beautiful! However, it doesn't stay on my skin longer than 3-5 hours. I am waiting for the mfk a la rose body cream, I will let you know if it helps with the longevity.<br />
<br />
A little update:<br />
The body cream is good but it doesn't really change longevity of the fragrance.<br />
<br />
XXX</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1337385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1337385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1337226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1337226" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ferra_Verto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ferra_Verto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Hypnotic-Vanilla-85038.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85038.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotic Vanilla"title="Hypnotic Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1337226ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1337226" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160884">Ferra_Verto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-04">05/04/21 08:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fairy roses, there's no other way to describe this. Imagine soft rose petals cycling through the air in an open clearing, their scent mingling with the fresh outdoor air. There's a soft after scent of a summer rain, and it makes the roses smell that much better. Delicate, but definitely no pushover with a solid longetivity in spite of its soft sillage. Lovely for spring and summer, I'll be purchasing once my sample is finished.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1337226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1337226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1336416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1336416" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leonoor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195552"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1195552.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leonoor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29083.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A La Rose"title="A La Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1336416ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1336416" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195552">Leonoor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-03">05/03/21 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ooh...Á la Rose...what a lovely light rose perfume you are. Etherical almost, like a fairytale princess. <br />
<br />
I was on the hunt for a light rose soliflore for quite some time already. (As for a lush rose perfume I found Luscious Roses by JoAnne Bassett to be my holy grail). But my longing for a lighter rose for spring and summer wasn’t fulfilled yet. Until last week :)<br />
<br />
When testing L’eau á la Rose last year, I thought I was testing this one. L’eau was too musky for me, so I wrote it off. But I stumbled on this beauty recently and it took me by surprise! This was exáctly what I was looking for. Oh my goddess!<br />
<br />
Á la Rose is not, (for my liking) like many others: too green, too musky, too sweet, too dewy, too spicy, too synthetic, gone too soon...it is not too anything. It is just perfect. Simply beautiful. As for the notes...nothing special going on here indeed, but the way this perfume is blended is the work of a true master perfumer. It is extremely well balanced. It is gorgeous! <br />
<br />
When I spray this in the evening, the next morning my skin smells like ‘my skin but better’. During the day this is just só comfy...it’s like walking in a dream of rose petals touching your skin and I lóve it!<br />
<br />
Don’t skip testing this one if you really care for a masterfully blended and very good quality light rose perfume!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1336416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1336416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="29083" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent785220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc785220" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LadyIva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1013003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LadyIva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Portrayal-Woman-54459.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54459.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Portrayal Woman"title="Portrayal Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma785220ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd785220" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013003">LadyIva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-01-24">01/24/17 16:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the most realistic rose fragrance that I have ever smelled. My grandfather was a keen gardener and he had a garden full of roses, of different varieties, inluding the Damascus, Turkish and Bulgarian roses. This is the exact same smell that I remember from my childhood, the scent of my granddad's beautiful rose garden. Now, I don't know the 'recipe' for this fragrance and how much of it is the actual rose oil, but it sure smells incredibly natural and realistic to me. I don't get many other notes - to me, this is just her gorgeous majesty the queen of flowers through and through.<br />
<br />
P.S. Perhaps this was once only available in Japan, but nowadays it is sold at every MFK counter worldwide.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="785220"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=785220#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1955905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1955905" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WhiteFlowerPrincess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662712"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1662712.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WhiteFlowerPrincess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Lucky-48385.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48385.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lucky"title="Lucky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1955905ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1955905" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662712">WhiteFlowerPrincess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-19">10/19/23 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is probably the only perfume by Maison Francis Kurkdijan that I really like! It is very feminine, sweet, floral, classy, sophisticated and romantic smelling. As per the description, it does really smell like something that Marie Antoinette would wear... I can imagine her with her white powdered hair piled up high and dressed in a powder blue roccoco dress while holding a pink rose as I smell this!<br />
<br />
À La Rose opens up with a bright and happy citrus smell from both the bergamot and the orange, but it doesn't overpower the composition and is very similar to the citric nuances you'd find in a real rose.<br />
<br />
I then smell a very sweet, powdery, lush, romantic and naturalistic pink rose that tickles my nostrils and makes me breathe a happy sigh of relief. It smells very quintessentially French, like a field of roses in Grasse. I smell the violet the most after the rose and it emphasizes the powderiness one finds in a rose. I sense a hint of magnolia too, but it is only faint.<br />
<br />
I finally smell a hint of the musk and cedar wood in the dry down, but it is only very subtle and it adds depth, dimension and longevity to À La Rose's composition. It doesn't take away from the rosy smell of this fragrance too and I can also smell more of the violet in the dry down as it dissipates.<br />
<br />
<br />
This perfume lasted an impressive 10 and a half hours on me and its sillage was a happy medium, so it definitely wouldn't offend anyone or choke anyone out and I think it is office safe. I feel like it would smell great in both the spring and the summer too.<br />
<br />
This isn't my absolute favorite rose fragrance ever, (that title goes to Rose Absolue by Annick Goutal) but I'd say it is a close second for me. All in all, I'd give À La Rose by Maison Francis Kurkdijan an 8.8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1955905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1955905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1388168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
