This is the most perfect rose perfume I have ever smelled. <br />
It is perfectly gorgeous with a hint of musk and magnolia.<br />
<br />
I also like to layer this on top of the baccarat rouge 540. The added rose gives a real feminine edge and I can’t stop sniffing myself. 😍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1388168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1388168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent755155" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc755155" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="epicurean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/32565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.32565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="epicurean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goutal/L-Ile-au-The-30006.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30006.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Ile au Thé"title="L’Ile au Thé"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma755155ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd755155" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/32565">epicurean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-10-24">10/24/16 18:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As Gertrude Stein once wrote: "Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose". I've tried this particular rose a few times, and despite its pleasantness, it is wholly unremarkable. If you need a daytime rose scent, there are much cheaper ones that will get the job done. Stein also wrote "Pale. Pale. Pale. Pale. Pale. Pale. Pale." She must have sniffed this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="755155"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=755155#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1050839" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1050839" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HyenaSuperstition"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/967017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.967017.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HyenaSuperstition" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Safanad-18749.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18749.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Safanad"title="Safanad"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1050839ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1050839" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/967017">HyenaSuperstition</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-14">04/14/19 03:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is really gorgeous. I had initially tried MFKBR540 and was sadly a little underwhelmed. While I liked certain aspects of it, the burnt sugary notes whizzing back and forth were a little much for me. A La Rose, however is lovely. I applied two sprays to my neck this afternoon at 6pm, it's now 3am and I am getting the most beautiful cloud enveloping my space. This feels like gentle moments of velvety rose that flit in and out of the experience. I hate to sound trite, but this fragrance is just that... A experience. The cedar continues to develop over and over again in a complex, yet creamy, dreamy, way. The more I wear this, the more I find it endlessly comforting. It's like a calming hug that I don't want to end. I appreciate how effortlessly pleasurable wearing this has been. Thank you MFK</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1050839"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1050839#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="29083" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent696430" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc696430" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/267736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.267736.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olympic-Orchids-Artisan-Perfumes/Chevalier-Vert-45515.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45515.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chevalier Vert"title="Chevalier Vert"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma696430ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd696430" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/267736">meama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-04-14">04/14/16 04:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>an office friendly rose without any special spark to differentiate it from too many other safe rose perfumes.<br />
it lacks so much personality that it becomes almost an air freshener.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="696430"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=696430#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1024625" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1024625" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Oudaddict"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1058831"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1058831.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Oudaddict" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Areej-Le-Dore/Russian-Musk-II-67896.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67896.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Russian Musk II"title="Russian Musk II"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1024625ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1024625" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1058831">Oudaddict</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-26">01/26/19 08:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Linear and basic, and disappointing from Francis Kurkdjian. Not worth the pricetag really when there are so many other similar rose fragrances for less. A clear money-making scheme due to pressure from LVMH that lacks any real artistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1024625"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1024625#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1256784" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1256784" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thazinha30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/493904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.493904.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thazinha30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-envie-Parfums/007-Idee-Fixe-61505.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61505.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="#007 Idée Fixe"title="#007 Idée Fixe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1256784ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1256784" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/493904">thazinha30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-04">12/04/20 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a disappointment... was eagerly waiting for my sample to arrive and as soon as I sprayed I smelled nothing but a generic floral smell that reminds of the dry down of some much cheaper floral you can find at discount stores or pharmacies. It is soooo boring, I don’t smell any citrus fruits (bergamot and orange which I love!) , I don’t smell the rose which is the reason I bought the sample, I smell... flower, a medley of them mish mashed together without any distinct notes. Unless what I smell IS the roses notes and if it is this is an even bigger disappointment... I was so looking forward to fresh, citrus, sparkly rose 🌹<br />
PS: after 2 hours it smells exactly how it smelled when I first sprayed it, had to shower to get this off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1256784"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1256784#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent671336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc671336" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="woodlandwalk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.11394.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="woodlandwalk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/La-Fille-de-Berlin-17162.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17162.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Fille de Berlin"title="La Fille de Berlin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma671336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd671336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394">woodlandwalk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-27">01/27/16 04:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds me of Dior's Forever and Ever, it's innocent, fresh, delicate and clean.<br />
<br />
Absolutely a tea rose in feel, with that lemony apple crispness. It's not my favourite rose style as I prefer Bulgarian or damask rose. I do love MFK's Oud Silk Mood which has a gorgeous light silky Turkish delight-style rose alongside lightly smoky oud.<br />
<br />
Anyway, these sorts of delicate fresh rose scents with additional abstract florals tend to remind me of some sort of 'Spring Rain' bubble bath, which is exactly how lots of women want to smell - delicate, feminine and fresh from a bubble bath, if that sounds good to you I'd recommend A La Rose!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="671336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=671336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1694387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1694387" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="diceee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1526090"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1526090.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="diceee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1694387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1694387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1526090">diceee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-23">11/23/22 04:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I liked this perfume (got a decant), but not enough to spend a hefty amount for a full bottle. While the scent is fresh, rosey, and clean that's perfect for the summer and humidity, the longevity is poor! It lasted in my skin for only about 1.5hrs and it's gone completely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="29083"comment_id="1694387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/A-La-Rose-29083.html?ccid=1694387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="29083" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>
    </div>

        </span>
    </div>

    <script>

                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
